script.title: disable-interface.slax
script.author: rsankar
script.synopsis: An example script to demostrate how a configuration can be committed from op-script
script.description: This script will deactive interface 'ge-0/0/2' upon receiving a PING_TEST_FAILED event, which is generated by rpm when the ping test fails. The ability to commit configuration from an op-script is effective in JUNOS 9.3
